name: Deadline (itch) (Bit Byte Bear)
description:
This game was made for Meditations, a launcher that serves one minigame per day. More information on http://meditations.games/

This is the description included in the Meditations launcher: 

Don't give everything for a deadline, because... you know what comes after one? Another deadline.

P.S: The game is shared as is. It's a small free project, and as such we can't give support or updates for it. Sorry about that!
